products.title: Unishade Blackout FR Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unishade Blackout FR Red Roller Blind in Red. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Offering complete light blockage & resistentance to moisture. Our stunning Unishade range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2401 Fabric Colour: Red Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
